a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Personal remittances and official development assistance received, World,
Remittances – financial transfers from non-residents to residents of a country, such as a worker abroad sending money to family
and friends – and official development assistance measured in current US$.
Source: World Bank based on data from the International Monetary Fund, Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
